data.name: Feedless Facebook Theme - News feed remover
Pillowfort Sidebar Scrolling
data.description:
Simply enables the scrollbar in the user profile sidebar.
Makes it possible to scroll said sidebar if the content inside is too tall.
(This style will be removed if/when scrolling is enabled on the site by default.)
